title: Spring Core on JDK9 is vulnerable to remote code execution
description: Overview Spring Core on JDK9+ is vulnerable to remote code execution due to a bypass for CVE-2010-1622. At the time of writing, this vulnerability is unpatched in Spring Framework and there is a public proof-of-concept available. As we have remediation advice for customers (see below), we have elected to share this information publicly.  Spring Core […]
